ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s easier for him to camp for the Mith BP, or the Mith Bracer than it is for wasting his time, so to speak on camping items which may or may not drop for
ygData.messageBody:
> Last night a high level wizard starting offering me a ton of mithril stuff
> in trade for my lambent. Having never seen a piece of mithril before in my
> life, I haven't the slightest whether or not this is a good trade or not.
> Anyone got any advice on the break down between mithril and lambent? He was
> offering multiple mithril pieces per one lambent piece.

It's easier for him to camp for the Mith BP, or the Mith Bracer
than it is for wasting his time, so to speak on camping items
which may or may not drop for quest armor. In this way laziness
pays off for the dilligent bard. The wizard no doubt has a L5
bard he's ready to twink up. Everyone wants to play a bard now,
it seems. Same thing is happening on Innoruuk, lots of Lambent
buyers who have twinks.

Harm.
